        <h1 class="h1">
         Welcome to the UK Groundwater Forum
        </h1>
        <h2 class="h2">
         *** NEW:
         <a href="http://resources.bgs.ac.uk/ebooks/GroundwaterbookV3.epub">
          Download
         </a>
         the e-book 2nd edition of 'Groundwater - our hidden asset'!***
        </h2>
        <p>
         Groundwater is a source of drinking water for millions of people in the UK. It supports our rivers and wetlands and the plants and wildlife that exist in and around them. But groundwater is under threat from our increasing water needs, pollution and climate change.
        </p>
        <p>
         Use this site to find out more about groundwater and the issues that affect this important natural resource.
        </p>
